select r.*
, case when u.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from cinemarate r
left join cinemaratereaction u on u.id = r.id and u.author = r.author and u.userId = #{userId}
where
r.id = #{id} and
r.author = #{author} and
r.rate = #{rate} and
r.time >= #{time} and
r.review like #{review} and
r.usefulCount >= (#{usefulCount}) and
1 = 1
order by {sort}

select * from cinemaratecomment where
commentId = #{commentId} and
id = #{id} and
author = #{author} and
userId = #{userId} and
comment ilike #{comment} and
time >= #{time} and
updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
